'''Zihaa''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Zihaa leads the naga incursion into the Watershapers Guild. She cannot be interacted with, and will attack you on sight.

Zihaa shares the same stats and model as [Coral n훮ga shaman](/coralNagaShaman/), and will get you bestiary experience towards naga shaman when killed.
